decision_conditions: It is considered, on the balance of probability, that the proposed extension would joining the existing rear and side extensions, and therefore the total enlargement to the original house would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (ja) and (j) (iii), of Class A, part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The proposed height of the eaves would exceed 3m in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (i), of Class A, part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that that the materials used in any exterior work of the proposed development would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse, in conflict with Condition A.3 (a) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
description: Erection of single storey rear extension (5.75m in depth, maximum height of 4.0m and eaves height of 3.05m)
